prompt: You are an autonomous coding agent completing STORY-17: Admin Branding & RTL for Itqan CMS. Customize Strapi admin interface with Itqan branding, ensure proper RTL support for Arabic users, and optimize admin user experience.
objectives: Apply Itqan branding to Strapi admin interface
Implement full RTL support for Arabic admin users
Customize admin layout and navigation for better UX
Add custom admin components for Quranic content management
tasks: Create custom admin theme with Itqan colors, logo, and typography
Implement RTL CSS support for Arabic admin interface
Customize Strapi admin login page with branded design
Add custom admin components for content type management
Configure admin panel translations for Arabic interface
Optimize admin navigation and layout for content workflow
Add custom dashboard widgets for content statistics
Implement admin user preferences for language and theme
Test admin interface across different browsers and devices
Create admin user guide with screenshots and workflows
guard_rails: Admin customizations must not break core Strapi functionality
RTL support should work seamlessly with existing admin features
Custom components must follow Strapi design system patterns
Branding should be professional and appropriate for Islamic content
Admin performance should not be degraded by customizations
acceptance_criteria: Admin interface displays Itqan logo and branded colors consistently
Arabic admin users see proper RTL layout with correct text direction
Custom dashboard shows relevant content statistics and quick actions
Admin login page reflects Itqan branding and mission
All admin functionality works correctly in both English and Arabic
definition_of_done: Admin branding implemented and consistent across all pages
RTL support fully functional for Arabic admin users
Custom admin components integrated without breaking existing features
Admin interface tested and optimized for performance
Admin user documentation updated with branded interface
out_of_scope: Complete admin panel rebuild or replacement
Advanced admin customizations beyond branding and RTL
Integration with external admin tools or dashboards
references: Itqan brand guidelines and visual identity
RTL best practices for web applications
Screen ADMIN-008: Customized Strapi login and dashboard with Itqan theme
